mapper.select: select * from dep where parent_cd is null

select.if: SELECT 1 as depth, dep1.dept_cd, dep1.dept_name, dep1.use_yn, dep1.dept_tag, dep1.parent_cd, dep2.dept_name as parent_name, dep2.dept_tag as parent_tag, dep3.dept_cd as grandparent_cd, dep3.dept_name as grandparent_name FROM dep dep1 LEFT JOIN dep dep2 ON dep1.parent_cd = dep2.dept_cd LEFT JOIN dep dep3 ON dep2.parent_cd = dep3.dept_cd WHERE dep3.dept_cd = #{lv1} AND dep1.use_yn = 'Y' AND (replace(dep1.dept_name,' ','') ILIKE replace(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'),' ','') OR replace(dep2.dept_name,' ','') ILIKE replace(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'),' ','')) ORDER BY dep1.dept_cd;

mapper.select: SELECT 1 as depth, dep1.dept_cd, dep1.dept_name, dep1.use_yn, dep1.dept_tag, dep1.parent_cd, dep2.dept_name as parent_name, dep3.dept_cd as grandparent_cd, dep3.dept_name as grandparent_name FROM dep dep1 LEFT JOIN dep dep2 ON dep1.parent_cd = dep2.dept_cd LEFT JOIN dep dep3 ON dep2.parent_cd = dep3.dept_cd WHERE dep3.dept_cd = #{lv1} AND dep1.use_yn = 'Y' AND (replace(dep1.dept_name,' ','') ILIKE replace(concat('%', '', '%'),' ','') OR replace(dep2.dept_name,' ','') ILIKE replace(concat('%', '', '%'),' ','')) ORDER BY dep1.dept_cd;
